name: camo-tracker
description: Camo tracker for Call of Duty Black Ops Cold War

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run server" "npm run coldwar" "npm run vanguard"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix coldwar && npm run build --prefix coldwar npm install --prefix vanguard && npm run build --prefix vanguard

author: Hartaithan.
